profile_name.description: The name of the profile for this filament. If there is a profile specifically for this filament, that is what should be specified, even if it is printer specific. For slic3r variants, data after the '@' does not need to be included and will be removed when loading into python.

overrides.description: Key-value pairs for settings that should be overridden for this filament

id.description: The unique identifier for this slicer profile

generic.description: Generic options that will automatically be mapped to the correct config definition for each slicer. Slicer specific settings are applied first, then these are applied on top.

first_layer_bed_temp.description: The target bed temperature for the first layer in the generated profile. Should ideally be within [min_bed_temperature, max_bed_temperature].

first_layer_nozzle_temp.description: The target nozzle temperature for the first layer in the generated profile. Should ideally be within [min_print_temperature, max_print_temperature].

bed_temp.description: The target bed temperature for the generated profile. Should ideally be within [min_bed_temperature, max_bed_temperature].

nozzle_temp.description: The target nozzle temperature for the generated profile. Should ideally be within [min_print_temperature, max_print_temperature].

name.title: Name
name.description: The manufacturer's name for this filament

diameter_tolerance.title: Diameter Tolerance (mm)

density.title: Density (g/cm³)
density.description: The density of the filament in g/cm³. Used for weight calculations.

shore_hardness_a.title: Shore Hardness A

shore_hardness_d.title: Shore Hardness D
shore_hardness_d.description: Hardness on Shore D scale (for rigid materials, typically 20-90)

certifications.title: Certifications

max_dry_temperature.title: Max Dry Temp (°C)
max_dry_temperature.description: Maximum temperature (°C) for drying without degradation

min_print_temperature.title: Min Print Temp (°C)
min_print_temperature.description: Minimum recommended nozzle temperature for printing (°C)

max_print_temperature.title: Max Print Temp (°C)
max_print_temperature.description: Maximum recommended nozzle temperature for printing (°C)

preheat_temperature.title: Preheat Temp (°C)
preheat_temperature.description: Recommended nozzle temperature for preheating/load cell bed leveling (°C)

min_nozzle_diameter.title: Min Nozzle Diameter (mm)
min_nozzle_diameter.description: Minimum nozzle diameter recommended for this material (mm)

safety_sheet_url.title: Safety Sheet URL
